name: naruto-multi-agent-cn
description: Multi-agent dispatcher: turns your main agent into a pure coordinator that delegates ALL tasks to 5 persistent sub-agents via sessions_spawn. Features round-robin scheduling, speak-before-spawn protocol, and fixed sessionKeys for session reuse. Themed as Naruto's Tsunade assigning S/A/B/C/D-ranked missions to shinobi (Chinese version).
author: cloudboy
